name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Full Stack Developer with over 13 years of experience in crafting high-performance applications, uniquely qualified in implementing **gRPC**, **RESTful APIs**, and adept in working with various database systems including **PostgreSQL**, **MySQL**, and **Neo4j**. Proven ability to develop robust solutions with a focus on **Kubernetes** for container orchestration, alongside establishing **CI/CD** pipelines and employing clean coding practices. Strong capabilities in automation practices, data structures, and algorithms enhance application robustness.

Skilled in languages such as JavaScript/TypeScript, Python, and Flutter, and hands-on expertise in both frontend and backend development using **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Experienced in developing AI/ML-powered platforms for predictive analytics, automation, and real-time processing, while proficient in deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**. Well-versed in compliance-driven development aligned with standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2, complemented by a robust background in MLOps utilizing **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
